text:
@realDonaldTrump No, it just shows u care more about statues than U
care 4 the citizens of our country, & our soldiers
at war. Wish U would spend the same energy on
the coronavirus that is killing thousands than 2 worry
about a few bronze statues. Your inactions spell out one
word to me: MURDER!
